name: Lone Relay Station
description:
LONE RELAY STATION is an experiment inspired by the idea of old relay boxes in the middle of a desert, with a lonely social worker sitting in inside,  receiving and transmitting Morse code from one end of the country to the other... manually

Hope you enjoy it as much as I enjoyed making it. This is my first ever game jam effort and "finishing" it helped me learn so much. 

Thanks
